overview: Belgian judge Koen Allegaerts (Gene Bervoets) and his unhappy wife Magda (Veerle Dobbelaere) find a brand-spanking-new solution to their marriage woes: S&M! But when Magda's ecstatic screams alarm their daughter, the couple takes their new hobby to a sex club. As their marriage flourishes, Koen runs an ever-increasing risk of losing his job in this quirky drama, based on a sensational true story.
title: Tied Together
